meanings.definition: A hard, brittle, crystalline structure formed in steel by the rapid cooling of austenite.
meanings.sent1: The martensites in the steel made it very strong and tough.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith studied the martensites under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The martensites in the steel were so stubborn, they refused to bend even a little.
meanings.sent4: Her resolve was as unyielding as the martensites in the steel.
meanings.sent5: The martensites sparkled like tiny diamonds in the metal.
